Worms Are Cool!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Worms Are Cool!
By Icelord13 on Thursday, January 29, 2004 - 06:43 pm:

I've decided to take a break from the epics section. I just haven't the time or inspiration. I used to be able to sit down and type. Now I'm experiencing a type of writers block. I'll take it easy for now, and post poems and short fiction. However, expect me to be back into the epics relatively soon. Oh well, hope you enjoy this one!

Worms Are Cool!

Worms are very good to train,
Many attacks to make guts drain.
Very long, slender bulk,
No trainer will have to sulk!

Withering attacks are a plus,
Making enemy monsters fuss.
A strong physical assault is thrust,
Kicking up a lot o dust.

Tournament winning is easy as pie,
Sometimes enemies will keel over and die.
Rewards are big, injuries small,
But not for the losers of the brawl!

So raise a worm, its loads of fun,
Its easy to get the big jobs done.
Its really worth it, take the risk,
And try to get worm from a mystery disc!

Expect to c more posts in the short fiction and poems. Hope you liked it! -Icelord13

By CHB on Saturday, January 31, 2004 - 09:24 pm:

Well, sorry, in my mind it gets to a point where originality and individualism of a story takes precidence. If everyone writes about Raidens only, then it is just Raiden Fiction. I would like to see more of a variety, thats all.

I simply promote making your story a one-of-a-kind, not a kind-of-a-one.

By Icelord13 on Saturday, January 31, 2004 - 09:46 pm:

I agree with CHB. I think there comes a time when a monster gets way too overused. Way back when i introduced Keemo the Raiden who is the leader of the MDA. Then, we get raiden quest, raieden poems, etc. Not that i'm saying the things weren't good and all, but maybe now we can try to be creative and incorporate a variety of monsters in our literature that will captivate all audiences. (god, i feel like my english teacher... x.x)
